players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. I have reason to suspect Diana, but I need your help in building a case against her."
Diana: "I agree with Bob that we need to focus on identifying the mafia. I have no information to share at this time, but I will support any efforts to uncover the truth."
Charlie: "I think we should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."

Diana: "I have nothing to hide and I believe in the power of transparency. I support Bob's efforts to uncover the truth, but let us not jump to conclusions based on suspicion alone. We should focus on gathering more information and considering all possibilities."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: remained silent.

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. I have reason to suspect Diana, but I need your help in building a case against her."
